=== Main inclusion report for network-manager ===

Author: ThomMay

=== Requirements ===

# ''Availability'': In universe, and builds on all arches.
# ''Rationale'': The package is a valuable addition to the desktop. It aids in automatic Network management, and is a large part of the <nowiki>[[http://udu.wiki.ubuntu.com/NetworkMagic|NetworkMagic]]</nowiki> spec.
# ''Security'':
** No CANs
** No Secunia reports
** Daemon runs as root to change network and wireless configuration. Listens only via dbus
 1. ''Quality Assurance'':
** Supported by Red Hat.
** nm-applet should be added to the default session
** Bugs: no showstopper bugs
 1. ''Standards Compliance'':
** Standard debhelper package
** Follows FHS
 1. ''Dependencies'': dhcdbd, already reviewed by Martin Pitt.

=== Reviewers ===
MartinPitt: approved
